sentences.english: The first failing, of which Mr Obama in particular is guilty, is misstating the problem.
sentences.chinese: 第一重失誤就是謊報病竈，奧巴馬難逃其咎。

sentences.english: Some children"will not be completely honest about their age", a spokesman said.
sentences.chinese: 一位發言人表示，一些孩子子“會謊報年齡”。

sentences.english: "I am a ghost too, " Dingbo lied.
When he was sixteen, he lied about his age to participate in the expedition.
sentences.chinese: 16歲時，他謊報年齡參加了遠征軍。

sentences.english: He lied about his age to join the army.
sentences.chinese: 他爲了參軍謊報了年齡。

sentences.english: Most Americans are romantics, don't lie about age-poll.
sentences.chinese: 多數美國人是浪漫主義者從不謊報年齡。

sentences.english: The case is now being investigated as filing a false report, a misdemeanor.
sentences.chinese: 警方現已將此案定性爲謊報案情的輕罪行爲。

sentences.english: Mass media often dissembled the true scale of help from ARA.
sentences.chinese: 大衆媒體經常謊報ARA所給予幫助的真實程度。

sentences.english: Cindy tends to lie about her weight and age.
sentences.chinese: 辛迪往往會謊報體重和年齡。

sentences.english: Do you ever lie about your age?
It id known to everyone that Mary lied about his age.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗謊報年齡是盡人皆知的事實。

sentences.english: Some children “will not be completely honest about their age”, a spokesman said.
sentences.chinese: 一位發言人表示，一些孩子“會謊報年齡”。

sentences.english: You should be ashamed of yourself, telling lies at your age.
sentences.chinese: 謊報年齡，你應該爲此感到羞恥。

sentences.english: He lied about his reasons for being late.

definition: abbr. for 國家安全局|国家安全局[Guo2 jia1 An1 quan2 ju2]
lit. to enter by the back door/fig. to gain influence by pull or unofficial channels/back door or under the counter connections
to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
to obscure the facts (idiom); to mislead the public with prevarication and deliberate falsehoods
Xihua county in Zhoukou 周口[Zhou1 kou3], Henan
to bring to justice/to punish according to the law
lit. to play the yu 竽 mouth organ to make up numbers (idiom); fig. to make up the numbers with inferior products/to masquerade as having an ability/token member of a group
